name: pnw-alliance-manager
description: Politics and War Alliance Manager - A comprehensive alliance management system

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/dist backend/node_modules frontend/dist frontend/node_modules node_modules

author: OrbixTech
